Description: You’re bidding on a 2019 Gibson USA Les Paul Classic Gold Top electric guitar in like-new condition. I recently ordered the guitar from an authorized dealer, and it arrived fresh from the factory. Authorized retailers currently sell this model for $2,299. I've played the guitar for a few hours and removed the protective plastic that was covering the pick guard. It has a fast, slim neck (for a Les Paul) and the Burstbucker pickups help it sound more like a vintage instrument. The guitar hasn’t been damaged or modified, and it comes complete with the original paperwork, hardshell case, and case candy (please see the photos). I’d love to keep this Les Paul, but I need to fund another guitar purchase. Authenticity guaranteed. Please let me know if you have any questions.
